name: places/ChIJQf0KWA_2wokRIXqp0x-pnuA
formattedAddress: 112 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 112 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: Unprofessional, dirty, unorganized, rude and inconsistent prices for the same exact items. Will never return. Don’t waste your hard earned money with these people

text.text: Unprofessional, dirty, unorganized, rude and inconsistent prices for the same exact items. Will never return. Don’t waste your hard earned money with these people

originalText.text: I went here to simply have my nose ring changed from a stud to a hoop. I originally went to another shop to have the piercing done but I didn’t want to do the travel to do a simple change. Well never again. Going into the shop should of been a sign. It was very small and dirty and people looked piled up around each other. The person then took me to the back, sat me down and took off my nose stud but then was unable to put the hoop in. He continually pushed around I guess trying to find the hole but hurting me and making me bleed in the process. After about 10 minutes or so he informed me he couldn’t do it and believes the original piercer made my piercing crooked. I was hurt and upset and contacted the shop that did my original piercing. The piercer messaged me right away saying he’s sure he did not mess up on a simple nose piercing and that the person was most likely unfamiliar on how to properly change jewelry. He then offered me to come into the shop and they can do the change. I went to that shop and no lie the change from the stud to the hoop was only about 30 seconds and pain free. The only good thing I have to say about this shop is the piercer was very apologetic that he was hurting me and did not ask for money when he couldn’t finish the job.

originalText.text: If I could rate 0 stars I would. I went in to get a piercing and not only was the piercer rude but he missed where he marked completely. It was extremely crooked and when I asked he said it was suppose to look like that due to the swelling. I had to take it out the next day and get it re done by someone who knew what they were doing. I would not recommend this place if you want a piercing.

originalText.text: Got a helix ear piercing, got to choose between a ring and a stud, I would hope that they would know a ring is a no no for a fresh piercing. Maybe it was the material of the jewelry or the way it was pierced but it got infected despite doing daily saline washes. The $5 lobe piercings I got at the back of the pharmacy/jewelry store on 116 worked out 10000% better than this.

originalText.text: Love the atmosphere there very helpful clean, organized and will work around your price range and expression and very reassuring when it comes to a mom taking her son to get his first tatoo
